subject: ExploreLearning Reflex Renewal Order 00129815 - SOMERSET ACADEMY-SKY POINTE
htmlContent:
Thank you for purchasing ExploreLearning Reflex®. This email is a confirmation of your order.

Subscription number: 00129815
Subscription end date: 07/31/2022

Update Account

1. Add or register a Reflex administrator (if one is not already assigned) for each site. Already active Reflex administrators continue to use their existing credentials.

  • SOMERSET ACADEMY-SKY POINTE: https://apps.explorelearning.com/account/reflex/registration/regcode/4JSKGTZ8
2. Invite new teachers to create Reflex accounts
3. Import new students into Reflex for teachers to add to classes
4. Promote, transfer or delete existing students for the new school year

Find Help
Our team is ready to help. Contact support online or toll-free 866-882-4141, option 2, then option 4. Please include your subscription number on all correspondences.

Help Center key resources: Reflex administrator's guide and Reflex teacher's guide.

Schedule Professional Development
For subscriptions with professional development, a coordinator will be in contact to discuss session options and scheduling. Contact us to get started.


ExploreLearning, a Cambium Learning company
110 Avon Street, Suite 300
Charlottesville, VA 22902
Learn more at http://www.reflexmath.com

You're receiving this email from ExploreLearning, please reply with any questions.

%opentrack%
textContent:
Thank you for purchasing ExploreLearning Reflex. This email is a confirmation of your order.

Subscription number: 00129815
Subscription end date: 07/31/2022


    
        Update Account:
            1.     Register a Reflex administrator for each site (if one is not already assigned):
            
                - SOMERSET ACADEMY-SKY POINTE  :  https://apps.explorelearning.com/account/Reflex/registration/regcode/4JSKGTZ8
            
            2.     Invite teachers to create Reflex accounts: https://explorelearningllc.force.com/help/s/article/Inviting-Teachers-to-Create-Reflex-Accounts
            3.     Import students into Reflex for teachers to add to classes: https://explorelearningllc.force.com/help/s/article/Importing-Students-via-CSV-File
    
    


Find Help:
Our team is ready to help. Contact support online (https://www.explorelearning.com/index.cfm?method=cCorp.dspSupportForm) or toll-free 866-882-4141, option 2, then option 4. Please include your subscription number on all correspondences.

Help Center (https://explorelearningllc.force.com/help/s/) key resources:
Reflex administrator's guide: https://explorelearningllc.force.com/help/s/article/Reflex-Quick-Reference-Guide-for-Administrator
Reflex teacher's guide: https://explorelearningllc.force.com/help/s/article/Reflex-Teacher-Guide

Schedule Professional Development:
For subscriptions with professional development, a coordinator will be in contact to discuss session options and scheduling. Contact us to get started: https://forms.gle/6T4jzKiz28X8B7kJ7
